name: WebArtClub AI Image Generator
author: Web Art Club

sections.description:
Introducing WebArtClub AI Image Generator Plugin – a powerful and innovative tool that seamlessly integrates with your website, allowing users to unlock their creativity and generate stunning AI-powered images using text and an API from Artsmart. With an easy-to-use form, your visitors can effortlessly turn their ideas into eye-catching visuals, enhancing user engagement and experience on your site.

Our plugin harnesses the power of cutting-edge text-to-image models, transforming text inputs into unique and captivating images perfect for various applications, from digital marketing and social media content to blog posts and advertising campaigns. By providing this creative solution, you empower your users to explore limitless design possibilities, all within your website’s ecosystem.

Integrating the AI Image Generator Plugin is a breeze. Web developers simply need an API key to access the plugin’s powerful features. With just two shortcodes, the form can be effortlessly displayed on your website’s frontend, allowing for seamless integration and minimal impact on your site’s design.

Here is a quick recap of what you can do.
* “AI-powered image generation from text input
* “Enhances user engagement and experience
* “Ideal for various applications (marketing, social media, blogs, etc.)
* “Easy integration with API key and two shortcodes
* “Encourages limitless design possibilities
* “Increases website’s appeal with cutting-edge technology
* “Seamless frontend form display for user convenience

Don’t miss the opportunity to enhance your website with the remarkable capabilities of the AI Image Generator Plugin. By offering this state-of-the-art text-to-image solution, you’ll not only increase user engagement but also position your site at the forefront of AI-driven design innovation. Get started today and witness the transformative impact of AI-powered image generation on your website’s user experience.

If you are not sure how to configure it, you can refer to our Documentation.

Disclosure
This plugin uses a 3rd party service, Artsmart. In order to use the API, you will need to register a plan with them. Please review their privacy policy and terms and conditions.
sections.installation:
1. Upload webart-generator.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
How do I get the API?

You will need to register at Artsmart and purchase one of their plans.
